name: Hack Attack (chrislewisdev)
description:
My TweetTweetJam3 entry!

Hack through as many levels of security as you can before the system kicks you out, by matching up waveforms to the one displayed on-screen using the directional keys. As you progress the waveforms will get increasingly unstable and harder to match!

X to start
Arrow keys to adjust your waveform

Gamepads supported too (and are more fun to play with in my opinion)

Enjoy!
